p:
To evaluate possible fecal contamination, PAdV DNA presence (
34 ) was determined for all samples assayed for HEV. PAdV was highly prevalent in feces (90%â€“98%) in investigated countries ( Table 1). None of 112 liver samples were PAdV positive, and only 1 of 112 meat samples was PAdV positive, in Italy. In addition, 4 (1%) of 313 sausages (2 from Spain, 1 each from Czech Republic and Italy) were positive for PAdV ( Table 1).
